meanings.definition: The act of updating or bringing something into the present time.
meanings.sent1: The modernising of the school curriculum was necessary for students' success.
meanings.sent2: His job involves the modernising of historical buildings to preserve them.
meanings.sent3: The modernising of the old car turned it into a stylish vintage vehicle.
meanings.sent4: The modernising of the kitchen transformed it into a sleek and functional space.
meanings.sent5: The modernising of the website attracted more visitors and increased user engagement.
